items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Shares that moved the most on January 6
items.description: While Jubilant Food Works and Nykaa's parent company, FSN E Comm Ventures, stood at the top of the gainers' list today, the losers mostly included banks that contributed to a major downside on the Nifty PSU Index today

items.title: ITC, SBI Cards, Titan among the top gainers and losers in trade on January 6
items.description: Benchmark indices Nifty and Sensex settled with sharp cuts on January 6, as the selling pressure intensified. Here’s a look at the top gainers and losers in trade today.

items.title: Taking Stock: Bloodbath on D-Street amid HMPV fears; Nifty below 23,650, Sensex tanks 1,258 pts
items.description: Biggest Nifty losers included Tata Steel, Trent, Coal India, NTPC and BPCL, while gainers were Apollo Hospitals, Tata Consumer, Titan Company, HCL Technologies

items.title: Live: Nifty Drops Below 200-DMA Amid HMPV Scare | PSU Banks, Realty Worst Hit | Closing Bell
items.description: Markets tumble as Nifty plunges over 400 points, sliding below 200-DMA. ₹8 lakh crore wiped out in a broad-based selloff, with PSU banks, realty, and metals leading the decline. India VIX surges 16%. Catch Nandita Khemka & Yatin Mota breaking it down.

items.title: Reduce Karur Vysya Bank; target of Rs 201: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended Reduce rating on Karur Vysya Bank with a target price of Rs 201 in its research report dated January 06, 2025.

items.title: SBI Cards shares rise as two brokerages see potential bullish triggers
items.description: Nomura expects credit cost to be about 9% in FY25F, while Nuvama upgraded SBI Cards share price target to Rs 850, an upside of 14%

items.title: Gensol Engineering shares surge over 8% as firm secures EPC contract for solar PV project
items.description: The EPC contract is from a renowned Public Sector Undertaking for the development of a 275 MW Solar PV Project at the RE Solar Park, Khavda, Rann of Kutch

items.title: JSW Energy shares crack 5% after CERC rejects proposed tariff for SECI project
items.description: CERC has cited that the tariff proposed by JSW Energy for the SECI project signed in January 2023 is much higher than what has been discovered in recent auctions.

items.title: Union Bank of India cracks 7% on weak December quarter business update
items.description: Union Bank of India deposits grew modestly by 4 percent YoY in Q3FY25, but declined 2 percent QoQ

items.title: Pre-earnings updates of banks signal a fall in credit off-take
items.description: Growth in personal loans has fallen off the cliff, while growth in gold loans has surged

items.title: Union Bank, Bank of Baroda, others crack up to 7% on weak Q3 updates; Nifty PSU Bank top sectoral laggard
items.description: The index is already trading lower by about 3 percent, with the top draggers being SBI, Bank of Baroda, and Canara Bank

items.title: Budget Snapshot | Dividends Over Divestments: The government's new playbook
items.description: The prevailing sentiment appears to favour maximizing returns through dividends rather than divestment

items.title: Subscribe for Standard Glass Lining Technology Ltd IPO; Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services, has come out with its report on Standard Glass Lining Technology Ltd. The research firm has recommended to “ Subscribe” the ipo in its research report as on January 04 2025.

items.title: FMCG company Marico's commentary on margin pressure weighs, shares down over 2%
items.description: During its third quarter business update, Marico said on January 3 that rising input costs may result in a higher-than-anticipated margin contraction, compared to a year ago. This may be due to the management's focus on expansion of the consumer franchise, said the company.

items.title: Standard Glass Lining Technology IPO: An opportunity to play the specialised engineering solutions theme?
items.description: Strong market positioning, a diversified product portfolio, strategic prospects and a proven financial track record

items.title: Jubilant Foodworks extends rally to 4th day, hits fresh 52-week high on positive Q3 update
items.description: Jubilant Foodworks reported 56 percent year-on-year growth in consolidated revenue for the December quarter to Rs 2,156 crore

items.title: Nykaa shares rise over 4% as firm sees Q3 net revenue growth higher than mid-20s
items.description: The beauty vertical of Nykaa has seen growth accelerated in Q3 compared to the previous quarters

items.title: Bajaj Finance surges over 2%, top Nifty gainer on strong Q3 update; Bajaj Finserv follows suit
items.description: Bajaj Finance reported 28 percent YoY growth in AUM, reaching Rs 3.98 lakh crore in Q3FY25

items.title: Markets in 2025 – Bears versus bulls, who will have the last laugh?
items.description: Market valuation and history suggest the possibility of a double-digit return in 2025

items.title: Agri Picks Report January 06 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, The UN Food and Agriculture Organization's Food Price Index fell 0.5% on month to 127.0 points in December as declining prices of sugar, dairy products, vegetable oils, and cereals offset increases in meat, the organisation said in a report.

items.title: Kotak Bank shares slip as CTO, COO Milind Nagnur resigns; Nomura maintains "buy" rating
items.description: Nomura maintained a "buy" rating on Kotak Mahindra Bank, setting a target price of Rs 2,170 per share

items.title: ITC: Demerger to improve return profile for the existing business
items.description: Proposed reorganisation will optimise cost structure and aid profitability

items.title: FMCG Q3 preview: Steady execution to drive volumes amid sticky high inflation
items.description: With improving rural performance, companies with diverse growth avenues will outperform peers
